1: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ ׀ <sup>5329 </sup> <n>To the chief Musician</n> לְעֶֽבֶד־ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>the servant</n> יְהוָ֬ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> לְדָוִֽד׃ <sup>1732 </sup> <n>[A Psalm] of David</n> נְאֻֽם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> פֶּ֣שַׁע <sup>6588 </sup> <n>The transgression</n> לָ֭רָשָׁע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>of the wicked</n> בְּקֶ֣רֶב <sup>7130 </sup> <n>within</n> לִבִּ֑י <sup>3820 </sup> <n>my heart</n> אֵֽין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>There</n> פַּ֥חַד <sup>6343 </sup> <n>[that there is] no fear</n> אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> לְנֶ֣גֶד <sup>5048 </sup> <n>before</n> עֵינָֽיו׃ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>before his eyes</n>
2: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הֶחֱלִ֣יק <sup>2505 </sup> <n>For he flattereth</n> אֵלָ֣יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> בְּעֵינָ֑יו <sup>5869 </sup> <n>himself in his own eyes</n> לִמְצֹ֖א <sup>4672 </sup> <n>be found</n> עֲוֹנ֣וֹ <sup>5771 </sup> <n>until his iniquity</n> לִשְׂנֹֽא׃ <sup>8130 </sup> <n>to be hateful</n>
3: דִּבְרֵי־ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>The words</n> פִ֭יו <sup>6310 </sup> <n>of his mouth</n> אָ֣וֶן <sup>205 </sup> <n>[are] iniquity</n> וּמִרְמָ֑ה <sup>4820 </sup> <n>and deceit</n> חָדַ֖ל <sup>2308 </sup> <n>he hath left off</n> לְהַשְׂכִּ֣יל <sup>7919 </sup> <n>to be wise</n> לְהֵיטִֽיב׃ <sup>3190 </sup> <n>[and] to do good</n>
4: אָ֤וֶן ׀ <sup>205 </sup> <n>mischief</n> יַחְשֹׁ֗ב <sup>2803 </sup> <n>He deviseth</n> עַֽל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> מִשְׁכָּ֫ב֥וֹ <sup>4904 </sup> <n>upon his bed</n> יִ֭תְיַצֵּב <sup>3320 </sup> <n>he setteth</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> דֶּ֣רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>himself in a way</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>is not</n> ט֑וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>[that is] not good</n> רָ֝֗ע <sup>7451 </sup> <n>not evil</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> יִמְאָֽס׃ <sup>3988 </sup> <n>he abhorreth</n>
5: יְ֭הוָה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>O LORD</n> בְּהַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>[is] in the heavens</n> חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <sup>2617 </sup> <n>Thy mercy</n> אֱ֝מֽוּנָתְךָ֗ <sup>530 </sup> <n>[and] thy faithfulness</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>to</n> שְׁחָקִֽים׃ <sup>7834 </sup> <n>[reacheth] unto the clouds</n>
6: צִדְקָֽתְךָ֨ ׀ <sup>6666 </sup> <n>Thy righteousness</n> כְּֽהַרְרֵי־ <sup>2042 </sup> <n>mountains</n> אֵ֗ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>[is] like the great</n> מִ֭שְׁפָּטֶךָ <sup>4941 </sup> <n>thy judgments</n> תְּה֣וֹם <sup>8415 </sup> <n>deep</n> רַבָּ֑ה <sup>7227 </sup> <n>[are] a great</n> אָ֤דָֽם־ <sup>120 </sup> <n>man</n> וּבְהֵמָ֖ה <sup>929 </sup> <n>and beast</n> תוֹשִׁ֣יעַ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>thou preservest</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>O LORD</n>
7: מַה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>How</n> יָּקָ֥ר <sup>3368 </sup> <n>How excellent</n> חַסְדְּךָ֗ <sup>2617 </sup> <n>[is] thy lovingkindness</n> אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>O God</n> וּבְנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>therefore the children</n> אָדָ֑ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>of men</n> בְּצֵ֥ל <sup>6738 </sup> <n>under the shadow</n> כְּ֝נָפֶ֗יךָ <sup>3671 </sup> <n>of thy wings</n> יֶחֱסָיֽוּן׃ <sup>2620 </sup> <n>put their trust</n>
8: יִ֭רְוְיֻן <sup>7301 </sup> <n>They shall be abundantly satisfied</n> מִדֶּ֣שֶׁן <sup>1880 </sup> <n>with the fatness</n> בֵּיתֶ֑ךָ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of thy house</n> וְנַ֖חַל <sup>5158 </sup> <n>of the river</n> עֲדָנֶ֣יךָ <sup>5730 </sup> <n>of thy pleasures</n> תַשְׁקֵֽם׃ <sup>8248 </sup> <n>and thou shalt make them drink</n>
9: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> עִ֭מְּךָ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>You</n> מְק֣וֹר <sup>4726 </sup> <n>For with thee [is] the fountain</n> חַיִּ֑ים <sup>2416 </sup> <n>of life</n> בְּ֝אוֹרְךָ֗ <sup>216 </sup> <n>in thy light</n> נִרְאֶה־ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>shall we see</n> אֽוֹר׃ <sup>216 </sup> <n>light</n>
10: מְשֹׁ֣ךְ <sup>4900 </sup> <n>O continue</n> חַ֭סְדְּךָ <sup>2617 </sup> <n>thy lovingkindness</n> לְיֹדְעֶ֑יךָ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>unto them that know</n> וְ֝צִדְקָֽתְךָ֗ <sup>6666 </sup> <n>thee and thy righteousness</n> לְיִשְׁרֵי־ <sup>3477 </sup> <n>to the upright</n> לֵֽב׃ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>in heart</n>
11: אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>nay</n> תְּ֭בוֹאֵנִי <sup>935 </sup> <n>come</n> רֶ֣גֶל <sup>7272 </sup> <n>Let not the foot</n> גַּאֲוָ֑ה <sup>1346 </sup> <n>of pride</n> וְיַד־ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>against me and let not the hand</n> רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <sup>7563 </sup> <n>of the wicked</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>nay</n> תְּנִדֵֽנִי׃ <sup>5110 </sup> <n>remove</n>
12: שָׁ֣ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>There</n> נָ֭פְלוּ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>fallen</n> פֹּ֣עֲלֵי <sup>6466 </sup> <n>There are the workers</n> אָ֑וֶן <sup>205 </sup> <n>of iniquity</n> דֹּ֝ח֗וּ <sup>1760 </sup> <n>they are cast down</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יָ֥כְלוּ <sup>3201 </sup> <n>and shall not be able</n> קֽוּם׃ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>to rise</n>
